title: Safe zoom slider in footer (like Vivaldi)
content:
Hello,

I've taken to using Vivaldi as my work browser and use the footer zoom slider quite often. While the dropdown menu in FF isn't terrible, it's still one more step to enable. And additional steps if I need to tweak. Anyone know a safe way to add this to the FF footer?

And while we're at it, where is the footer?

Thanks
creator: dweade+firefox

title: Cannot select Yahoo mail message using the checkbox.  Cannot reply, delete, etc.  Trash icons missing. Everyting works in Google Chrome
content: Yahoo mail Cannot select a message using the checkbox. Cannot reply, delete, etc. Trash icons are missing All works in Google Chrome. Clearing cache/cookies, restarting computer, nothing works.
creator: mma049
